content: Hello, I'm working with my health system to integrate CDS Connect authoring tool into CDS Hooks but we are looking for other health systems that have successfully run this for health operations? Any takers to show us what an end-to-end CQL authoring to FHIR implementation into a CDS service like Hooks? Thanks for considering.
@Isaac Vetter @Bryn Rhodes

Hi @Majid Afshar , there is a repository here that is a demonstration of end-to-end authoring of FHIR and CQL running in aCDS Hooks service:
https://github.com/alphora/cqf-ccc/blob/master/WALKTHROUGH.md

There are lots of examples of projects using this same approach with different content here:
https://github.com/cqframework/clinical_quality_language/wiki/Community-Projects#content

Thanks Bryn for sharing this. We've seen multiple examples using the FHIR
HAPI server with synthetic patients and CDS Sandbox, but we were hoping to
see something in production at a health system. Our operations folks are
hoping to see how a health system's knowledge management division/team
authored a CDS tool and then served as data stewards to coordinate with
enterprise analytics and devops/data engineers for a real production item
that met their quality care needs. Any help or offer from a health system
is much appreciated. Thank you
I will reach out to some implementing sites and see if they are willing to speak.
Hi @Bryn Rhodes just checking in to see if any implementation sites are willing to speak?
Hi @Majid Afshar , we are reaching out, waiting to hear back

Hi Majid:

I work with Bryn on the CDS for CDC project. We have conducted CDS Hooks pilots utilizing project CDS artifacts at four sites. To be clear, these are feasibility pilots, not production implementations. I will reach out to the pilot sites and let them know that you may be interested in engaging with them. There is a fifth site that utilizes a SMART app to launch an interface with a CDS service, and this approach is in production. I can reach out to them as well. I ask for your patience as I am at HIMSS this week. However, be assured that I will follow back up with you once I have a response from the sites.

Hi @Greg White , hi @Majid Afshar I will be also interested to be in the loop, we are currently, in France, assessing these different tools and specifications and we will be very happy to speak with them and to have their feedback
Thank you @Greg White and @Bryn Rhodes . Sorry I couldn't be at HIMSS to meet and get better acquainted but happy to wait until you hear back. Thanks again
